name: JumpStart Pet Rescue
overview: Join the JumpStart friends on a learning adventure designed for little hands and big imaginations! The first learning game for preschoolers ever offered for Wii, JumpStart Pet Rescue is packed with over 80 fun-filled lessons and activities designed for 3-6 year olds. As players explore five worlds on a mission to rescue lost pets, they practice over 75 essential skills including pre-reading, memory, listening and more.
